title: Sans Serif
author: namee

comments.content:
"2/4 WHEEL D" (i.e. capitals & numerals) must be **[Ronda (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125809/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=Ronda%20-%20Bold&fid=5e053a7afcd778e67d7c3b229de8edf2&fsize=60&text=2%2F4WHEEL%20Data&wrap=2)** by Herb Lubalin [1970] once upon a time offered by Image Club Graphics, now available from ITC

"ata" looks like **[Franklin Gothic Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125809/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Franklin%20Gothic%20LT%20Condensed%20-%20Regular&fid=0cbdd30438eb86a74ebd802f034327db&fsize=60&text=ata&wrap=2)**
